ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: and the moon when it follows it,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And the moon as she follows in his wake,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and by the moon as it follows it;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: by the moon when it follows the sun,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And by oath of the moon when it follows the sun
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: By the moon as it Talaha.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And the moon when it follows the sun,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and by the moon when she follows him,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And the moon when she followeth him,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and by the moon as it follows it,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: By the moon, when she followeth him,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: by the moon when he follows her,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: By the Moon as she follows him;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And by the moon as it follows it (the sun);
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: by the moon, which follows it,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And the moon as it follows it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And [by] the moon when it follows it
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [91:2] and [by] the moon when it follows her, rising after she has set,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And the moon when she followeth him) when it follows the sun, on the first night when the new moon is seen, 757
